beginner.name: Beginner
beginner.description: Introduction to basic diagnostic concepts with clear, classic presentations

case_characteristics.time_pressure: Relaxed (no time limit or generous limits)

example_cases: Classic Major Depressive Disorder in adults
beginner.unlock_message: Welcome to your diagnostic journey! Start with these foundational cases to build your skills.

intermediate.name: Intermediate
intermediate.description: More complex presentations with subtle variations and common comorbidities

case_characteristics.symptom_clarity: Some atypical features or overlapping symptoms
case_characteristics.rarity_factor: Common and some less common conditions

example_cases: Bipolar Disorder vs. ADHD in adolescents
Personality Disorder traits with mood symptoms
intermediate.unlock_message: You're ready for more complex challenges! These cases will test your differential diagnosis skills.

advanced.name: Advanced
advanced.description: Complex cases with multiple comorbidities, atypical presentations, and diagnostic challenges
example_cases: Schizoaffective Disorder vs. Bipolar with Psychotic Features
Somatic Symptom Disorder with medical complexity
advanced.unlock_message: Expert-level challenges await! These cases will push your diagnostic abilities to the limit.

expert.name: Expert
expert.description: Highly complex, rare, and challenging cases that require advanced clinical reasoning
example_cases: Complex dissociative disorders with trauma history
expert.unlock_message: You've reached the pinnacle! These cases represent the most challenging diagnostic scenarios in psychiatry.

progression_rules.unlock_mechanism: Automatic when level requirement is met
progression_rules.difficulty_scaling: XP rewards scale with complexity and accuracy

streak_bonuses.beginner: +5 XP per correct case in streak
streak_bonuses.intermediate: +10 XP per correct case in streak
streak_bonuses.advanced: +15 XP per correct case in streak
streak_bonuses.expert: +25 XP per correct case in streak

time_bonuses.description: Bonus XP for quick, accurate diagnoses

specialty_bonuses.description: Bonus XP for working in less-practiced categories
specialty_bonuses.novice_category: +20% XP for categories with <5 cases completed
specialty_bonuses.developing_category: +10% XP for categories with 5-15 cases completed
specialty_bonuses.expert_category: No bonus for categories with >15 cases completed

adaptive_difficulty.description: System adjusts difficulty based on user performance
